name: Melee Attack Roll
description: To make a Melee Attack Roll you need to use your d20 + proficiency modifier + your strenght modifier

name: Ranged Attack Roll
description: To make a Ranged Attack Roll you need to use your d20 + proficiency modifier + your dexterity modifier

name: Ability Check
description: To perform an ability check you need to use your d20 + your bonus in that particular ability

name: Saving Throw
description: To perform a saving throw in a statistic like Strength you need to use your d20 + your proficiency bonus (if you have it) + your modifier in that statistic

name: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack Roll
description: To prform a Melee or Ranged Spell Attack you need to use your d20 + your proficiency modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier

name: Grapple Check
description: To perform a grapple check you need to use a d20 + your athletics modifier; your opponent has to do the same and the greatest of the two wins the check

name: Unarmed Attack Roll
description: To make an Unarmed Attack Roll you need to perform a Melee Attack Roll without the proficiency modifier, except if you are a monk

name: Throw Roll
description: To throw an item in a precise location you need to use a d20 + your strength or dexterity modifier
